faq_benefits: What are the benefits of the Fastwork rewards program?
faq_benefits_answer: Examples of benefits from the Fastwork rewards program include cashback for freelancers, special discounts for hiring, exclusive partner discounts, and many more privileges. Note: The benefits may change over time to align with user needs.
faq_expiration: Do points in the Fastwork rewards program have an expiration date?
faq_expiration_answer: Fastwork Points have a validity of 6 months and expire at the end of the 3rd month. Example: If you earn points in January, they will expire on April 30. When you redeem rewards, the points that are closest to expiration will be used first automatically.
faq_join_rewards: How do I join the Fastwork rewards program to receive benefits?
faq_join_rewards_answer: Simply log in to Fastwork and go to the 'Missions' page to start earning points and redeem exclusive rewards instantly. If you have any issues accessing the system, please contact our support center.
faq_more_points: How can I get more points in Fastwork rewards?
faq_more_points_answer: Complete various activities listed on the missions page, such as logging in and checking in daily. Special for freelancers! Receive work through the Fastwork system every 320 baht and earn 1 point automatically.
task_first_job_post: First successful post on the job board
task_repeat_hire: Successfully hired the same freelancer more than once
terms_1: Any exchange of discounts, prizes or privileges is final once exchanged and cannot be refunded or exchanged.
terms_2: To ensure that you get the most benefit from the Fastwork Rewards program, please check the expiration date of your accumulated points regularly and redeem your reward points within the specified time.
terms_3: Fastwork reserves the right to determine and change the conditions of the Fastwork Rewards program, including reward redemption, without prior notice.
